full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 185 of 228 861 LC2VMAX6 Alessi - Direct

1 MS. COMEY: No, your Honor. I think our position is clear that we think it should come in at this time, but understood.
2 MR. PAGLIUCA: I think that's entirely appropriate. I guess the question is are you conditionally admitting it or not.
3 THE COURT: The reason I ask, do you need -- is there more to do with it now or can we simply reserve and move on till the other witness?
4 MS. COMEY: I think it's fine to reserve, your Honor.
5 THE COURT: Okay. So if that's what I do, I won't conditionally admit and we'll take it from there.
6 MR. PAGLIUCA: Okay.
7 THE COURT: Anything to take up before we bring the witness back?
8 MR. PAGLIUCA: Not from me, your Honor.
9 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, I apologize if I was not clear, but we do want to admit this through this witness. And I do have questions for him about this exhibit, so we are seeking to admit it. I apologize. My colleagues let me know that I was not clear.
10 THE COURT: It wasn't that you weren't clear. That's an opposite answer of the one you just gave.
11 MS. COMEY: I apologize, your Honor. I misunderstood the question.

SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012470
